00040 #ifndef actorcontainervector_cpp
00041 #define actorcontainervector_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "actorcontainervector.h"
00044 
00045 
00046 namespace phys
00047 {
00048     ActorContainerVector::ActorContainerVector ()
00049         { this->Priority = -40; }
00050 
00051     void ActorContainerVector::AddActor(ActorBase* ActorToAdd)
00052     {
00053         this->RecentlyAdded = ActorToAdd;
00054         this->push_back(ActorToAdd);
00055         this->ActorContainerBase::AddActor(ActorToAdd);
00056     }
00057 
00058     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::LastActorAdded()
00059         { return this->RecentlyAdded; }
00060 
00061     void ActorContainerVector::RemoveActor(ActorBase* ActorToRemove)
00062     {
00063         this->ActorContainerBase::RemoveActor(ActorToRemove);
00064         //we need to iterate through and remove all items of that match the actor to match the description in the container base
00065         for( vector<ActorBase*>::iterator c=this->begin(); c!=this->end(); c++)
00066         {
00067             if ( ActorToRemove == *c )
00068             {
00069                 c=this->erase(c);
00070             }
00071         }
00072     }
00073 
00074     void ActorContainerVector::RemoveActorAtCursor()
00075         { this->cursor=this->erase(this->cursor); }
00076 
00077     Whole ActorContainerVector::GetActorCount() const
00078         { return this->size(); }
00079 
00080     void ActorContainerVector::CursorToFirst()
00081     {
00082         if(this->empty())
00083             throw("Cannot move Cursor in an empty container");
00084 
00085         this->cursor=this->begin();
00086     }
00087 
00088     void ActorContainerVector::CursorToPrevious()
00089     {
00090         if(this->empty())
00091             throw("Cannot move Cursor in an empty container");
00092 
00093         if(this->cursor != this->begin())
00094             this->cursor--;
00095     }
00096 
00097     void ActorContainerVector::CursorToNext()
00098     {
00099         if(this->empty())
00100             throw("Cannot move Cursor in an empty container");
00101 
00102         if(this->cursor != this->end())
00103             this->cursor++;
00104     }
00105 
00106     void ActorContainerVector::CursorToLast()
00107     {
00108         if(this->empty())
00109             throw("Cannot move Cursor in an empty container");
00110 
00111         this->cursor=this->end();
00112     }
00113 
00114     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::GetAtCursor() const
00115     {
00116         if(this->empty())
00117             throw("Cannot get from in an empty container");
00118 
00119         return *(this->cursor);
00120     }
00121 
00122     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::GetFirst() const
00123         { return *(this->begin()); }
00124 
00125     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::GetLast() const
00126         { return *(this->end()); }
00127 
00128     String ActorContainerVector::GetContainerType() const
00129         { return String("phys::ActorContainerVector"); }
00130 
00131     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::FindActor(btCollisionObject* PhysicsObject)
00132     {
00133         //we need to iterate through and remove all items of that match the actor to match the description in the container base
00134         for( vector<ActorBase*>::iterator c=this->begin(); c!=this->end(); c++)
00135         {
00136             if ( PhysicsObject == GetCollisionObject(*c) )
00137             { return *c; }
00138         }
00139         return NULL;
00140     }
00141 
00142     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::FindActor(Ogre::Node* GraphicsNode)
00143     {
00144         //we need to iterate through and remove all items of that match the actor to match the description in the container base
00145         for( vector<ActorBase*>::iterator c=this->begin(); c!=this->end(); c++)
00146         {
00147             if ( GraphicsNode == GetNode(*c) )
00148             { return *c; }
00149         }
00150         return NULL;
00151     }
00152 
00153     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::FindActor(String Name)
00154     {
00155         //we need to iterate through and remove all items of that match the actor to match the description in the container base
00156         for( vector<ActorBase*>::iterator c=this->begin(); c!=this->end(); c++)
00157         {
00158             if ( Name == (*c)->GetName() )
00159             { return *c; }
00160         }
00161         return NULL;
00162     }

00164     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00165     // WorldGetSet/ManagerBase Members
00166     ///////////////////////////////////
00167     World* ActorContainerVector::GetGameWorld() const
00168         { return this->GameWorld; }
00169 
00170     void ActorContainerVector::SetGameWorld( World* GameWorld_ )
00171         { this->SetGameWorld( GameWorld_, true, true ); }
00172 
00173     void ActorContainerVector::SetGameWorld( World* GameWorld_, bool AddToWorld, bool RemoveFromWorld)
00174     {
00175         if (RemoveFromWorld && this->GameWorld != NULL)
00176         {
00177             for( vector<ActorBase*>::iterator c=this->begin(); c!=this->end(); c++)
00178                 { (*c)->RemoveObjectFromWorld(this->GameWorld); }
00179         }
00180 
00181         this->GameWorld = GameWorld_;
00182 
00183         if (AddToWorld && this->GameWorld != NULL)
00184         {
00185             for( vector<ActorBase*>::iterator c=this->begin(); c!=this->end(); c++)
00186                 { (*c)->AddObjectToWorld(this->GameWorld); }
00187         }
00188     }

00191         {}
00192 
00193     void ActorContainerVector::DoMainLoopItems()
00194         {}
